contents: Article 10 (Executives) ① The corporation shall have one chairman, four executive directors, nine non-executive directors and one auditor as executives. Revised May 26, 2015, December 28, 2016, April 1, 2019, ② Non-executive directors shall be persons who fall under any of the following items: 1. Representatives of employers recommended by a national employer organization Persons: 2 people, 2. Persons recommended by labor union federation organizations as worker representatives: 2 people, 3. Persons recommended from farmers and fishermen groups, self-employed people groups, consumer groups or civic groups as representatives of local subscribers: 2 people, 4. Beneficiaries. Person representing: 2 people, 5. Ex officio director: 1 level 3 national public official in charge of national pension affairs at the Ministry of Health and Welfare or a general public official belonging to the Senior Civil Service Corps.
